title: PGIMER Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for Project Nurse Post
description: Postgraduate Institute of Medical Education and Research (PGIMER) has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Project Nurse Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the B.Sc Nursing, GNM can grab this chance and apply for these posts. Here, we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, educational details, application fee, and how to apply for the PGIMER Recruitment 2025 . Interested candidates can apply before the last date of applicatio...
